metadata.feature_description: Allows administrators to create new page templates with name, description, and layout selection

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create template with valid name and description

steps.expected: Templates page loads with Add Template button
steps.actual: Templates page loaded successfully showing existing templates and Add Template button

steps.expected: Add Template form appears with name, description, and layout selection fields
steps.actual: Form appeared with Template Name*, Description, and Page Template* fields. Cavalier - Main was pre-selected

steps.action: Enter 'Test Template Valid' as name and description text
steps.expected: Values are entered in the form fields
steps.actual: Values entered successfully in both fields

steps.expected: Template is created and appears in the list
steps.actual: Template 'Test Template Valid' was created successfully and appeared in the templates list

steps.action: Click Add Template button and select different layout template
steps.expected: User can select different layout templates, selection indicator moves
steps.actual: Clicked on 'Test Template Page' layout and the green checkmark moved from 'Cavalier - Main' to 'Test Template Page'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Validate empty template name shows error

steps.action: Click Create button with empty template name
steps.expected: Validation error message appears for required field
steps.actual: Error message 'This field is required.' appeared in red below the Template Name field

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Validate script injection prevention in template name

steps.action: Enter '<script>alert('XSS')</script>' in template name and click Create
steps.expected: Script tag is blocked with appropriate error message
steps.actual: Error message 'The template name can't contain scripts.' appeared in red, preventing XSS attack

steps.action: Click Cancel button on Add Template form
steps.expected: Form closes without creating a template
steps.actual: Form was dismissed and returned to template list view without creating a new template

steps.action: Enter template name with special characters: @#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",./<>?/~`
steps.expected: Special characters are accepted (except script tags)
steps.actual: Special characters were accepted and template was created successfully

steps.action: Verify template with special characters appears in list
steps.expected: Template appears in list with special characters displayed
steps.actual: Template 'Test @#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",./<>?/~` Special!' appeared in the templates list

steps.expected: Input is truncated to 50 characters due to maxlength attribute
steps.actual: Input was automatically truncated to 50 characters: 'This is a very long template name that exceeds the'

steps.action: Deselect all layout templates and attempt to create
steps.expected: Validation error appears requiring template selection
steps.actual: Error message 'You need select a template to create new template.' appeared in pink banner

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify new template appears in list after creation

steps.action: Verify all created templates appear in the template list
steps.expected: All newly created templates are visible in the list
steps.actual: Template list shows 5 templates including 'Test Template Valid' and 'Test @#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",./<>?/~` Special!' created during testing

observations: The default layout template (Cavalier - Main) is automatically pre-selected when opening the Add Template form
Script injection prevention uses regex pattern to detect <script> tags in the template name
The maximum length for template name is 50 characters (enforced via HTML maxlength attribute)
Newly created templates can immediately be used as layout templates for creating more templates
Template thumbnails are generated automatically after template creation
